articles.author: Museums Victoria
articles.title: Scientists uncover hidden bone structures in the skin of Australian monitor lizards - Phys.org
articles.description: Beneath the scales of Australia's iconic monitor lizards (commonly known as goannas), scientists have discovered an unexpected secret: a hidden layer of bony skin structures known as osteoderms. These structures, which have been long overlooked, may hold the …
